DOC.brief_summary: To identify the circumstance during decision making processes to seek medical help in patients with symptoms of acute ischemic stroke.
DOC.brief_title: A Qualitative Study of Delays in Hospital Admission in Patient With Acute Stroke
DOC.criteria: patients with confirmed acute ischemic stroke by brain image and were able to communicate in Mandarin or Taiwanese. patients who had cerebral hemorrhage, aphasia, cognitive dysfunction or severe stroke with unstable vital sign.
